str2: Neuter of hostis as conjunction; demonstrative, that; causative, because.
Of Hebrew origin; Joannes, the name of four Israelites.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: Lit: I dip, submerge, but specifically of ceremonial dipping; I baptize.
Water. And genitive case, hudatos, etc. From the base of huetos; water literally or figuratively.
A primary particle; but, and, etc.
A day, the period from sunrise to sunset.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Nominative 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.

parse: Verb - Future Indicative Passive - 2nd Person Plural
str2: Lit: I dip, submerge, but specifically of ceremonial dipping; I baptize.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.
Set apart by (or for) God, holy, sacred. From hagos; sacred.
